name: T1_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;They will need to be visited in order to protect them from bandits!|They may even give you rewards like items, weapons, or maybe someone will join your cause!|Get there quick cause Bandits can destroy the villages.|You'll then lose any reward you could've gotten from them!;;;;6

speak;Anna;Here are some tips to help make the most out of the pair up mechanic!|For this example we have poor Ross and Garcia just out of reach by normal walking means.|Fortunately, we have Vanessa here!;;;;6

speak;Anna;If we pair up Eirika with Vanessa we can get across the mountains!|Then you can switch to Eirika with the <red>"Switch"</> command and talk with Ross and recruit him Turn 1!|Here is just one example of what pair up can do to get units to places they normally can't.|See what you can come up with!;;;;6
